## Gene Details:

- **Gene Symbol:** <u>RUS1, WXR3</u>
- **Gene Name:** ROOT UVB SENSITIVE 1, WEAK AUXIN RESPONSE 3
- **Description:**   root UVB sensitive-like protein (Protein of unknown function, DUF647);(source:Araport11)
